Package com.badlogic.box2dlights.box2dLight

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BlendFunc
    Helper class that stores source and destination factors for blending
    ChainLight
    A light whose ray starting points are evenly distributed along a chain of vertices
    ConeLight
    Light shaped as a circle's sector with given radius, direction and angle
    DirectionalLight
    Light which source is at infinite distance
    Light
    Light is data container for all the light parameters.
    PointLight
    Light shaped as a circle with given radius
    PositionalLight
    Abstract base class for all positional lights
    RayHandler
    Handler that manages everything related to lights updating and rendering
    Spinor
